scripts.devInit:
echo " 
 ********Installing Client Packages********* " && cd client && npm i && echo " 
 ******** Installing Server Packages ************ " && cd ../server && npm i && echo "Installing Main Packages " && cd ../ && npm i && echo "COMPLETED INSTALLING ALL PACKAGES"
scripts.client: echo "Starting Client Vite Server " && cd client && npm run dev
scripts.pDevInit:
echo " 
 ********Installing Client Packages********* " && cd client && pnpm install && echo " 
 ******** Installing Server Packages ************ " && cd ../server && pnpm install && echo "Installing Main Packages " && cd ../ && pnpm install && echo "COMPLETED INSTALLING ALL PACKAGES"
scripts.pClient: echo "Starting Client Vite Server " && cd client && npm run dev
scripts.server: echo "Starting Express Server with Nodemon " && nodemon server/server.js
